mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Benzenger, Englebut
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Benzenger, Englebut Patient Age: 33. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Incised wound of left hand. Caused by a knife and sticking him on the hand while in guard house in Cumberland. Nature of Wound: Butcher knife. Result: Returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Benzenger, Englebut
Incised wound of left hand. Caused by a knife and sticking him on the hand while in guard house in Cumberland
